comment:
CR-075 pre-review: COMPLIANT. All verification items passed.

PLACEHOLDERS: Zero {{template placeholders}} found. All execution-time fields use [square bracket] format ([SUMMARY], [Pass/Fail], [PERFORMER] - [DATE], [EXECUTION_SUMMARY]).

QUALIFIED BASELINE: Section 7.5 references commit hash 78ec519 with QMS-CLI-1.12, 392 tests. Not a placeholder.

REFERENCES: SOP-001, SOP-002, SOP-004, SOP-006, CR-073, CR-074, and UAT session referenced. Complete.

TU ASSIGNMENT: No TU assignment needed. CR affects only QMS/MCP infrastructure (server.py, .mcp.json, SDLC-QMS-RS/RTM). No UI, sketch, simulation, or scene domains impacted. QA-only review is sufficient.

NO DEFICIENCIES FOUND.

CR-075 post-review: COMPLIANT. All SOP-002 Section 7.3 post-review conditions verified.

- EI-5: RTM updated to EFFECTIVE v13.0 (1 correction cycle for arithmetic deficiency, documented in Execution Comments). Pass.
- EI-6: PR #11 merged (386ff44), submodule updated. Pass.

- SDLC-QMS-RTM: EFFECTIVE v13.0 (confirmed via qms_status). PASS.

DOCUMENTATION: All controlled documents modified under this CR (RS, RTM) are EFFECTIVE. No documents remain in DRAFT or IN_REVIEW.

EVIDENCE: Each EI has specific completion evidence (commit hashes, CI URLs, version numbers, PR references). Execution Summary (Section 11) is comprehensive.

EXECUTION COMMENTS: Two comments properly documented -- EI-5 correction cycle disclosure and .mcp.json operational deployment scope note. Both are accurate and transparent.
